code: import{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Container,Typography,TextField,Button,Box,Link}from'@mui/material';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{signup}from'../services/auth';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SignupPage=()=>{const[name,setName]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[phone,setPhone]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const{signup:authSignup}=useAuth();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');setLoading(true);try{await authSignup(name,email,phone,password);navigate('/events');}catch(err){setError('Failed to create an account.
